snippet: Mayor Dewey F. Bartlett Jr.’s decision effectively kills the city’s chance of hosting the Games because the United States Olympic Committee requires support from local government.
abstract: Tulsa Mayor Dewey F Bartlett Jr withdraws his support of plan to bring 2024 Olympics to Oklahoma, acknowledging that the city is not equipped to host such an enormous international event; his decision effectively kills Tulsa's chances of hosting Summer Games, given that United States Olympic Committee requires support from local government.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Dewey F. Bartlett Jr.’s decision effectively kills the city’s chance of hosting the Games because the United States Olympic Committee requires support from local government.

headline.main: On Tulsa’s Long-Shot Olympic Pitch, Mayor and Others Say Never Mind
headline.print_headline: On Tulsa’s Long-Shot Olympic Pitch, Mayor and Others Say Never Mind
